Security.title: Namespaces, Types, GraphQL Enums, and More!
Security.description: Changes that will greatly improve data modeling capabilities for our users

seo.title: Vendia adds support for Namespaces, Types and GraphQL Enums
seo.description: Over the last few weeks, the Vendia Engineering team has been hard at work finalizing a number of changes that will greatly improve the data modeling capabilities for our users. In addition, the automatically generated GraphQL interface and resolvers have also been improved to provide native GraphQL support for enumerations.

Improvements.title: Handling errors the GraphQL way and adding more results to your queries
Improvements.description: We've updated response status codes and now allow up to 1000 results per query.

Improvements.title: We're .COMical, Neatly Nested, and More
Improvements.description: Vendia is on .com, allows filtering on any nested attribute, updated SDK defaults, and enhanced experience within GraphQL Explorer

Improvements.title: Staying Cool This Summer with New Features and Improvements
Improvements.description: Result sorting, enhanced schema evolution, improved ingestion and consensus performance, geo-blocking and more

Improvements.title: Improved Security, Performance and Transparency
Improvements.description: Vendia Share supports more seure API Keys, JWT authentication, low latency operations, and Vendia Metrics.

Improvements.title: Developer Experience Improvements: a New SDK, Sync Mutations, and Invite Flow
Improvements.description: Vendia Share now has a Typescript SDK, new synchronous mutations and an improved node invite flow.

Improvements.title: At Your Request: Managing Nodes, Bigger Files, and AWS Marketplace!
Improvements.description: Vendia Share now supports node departure, 5GB file sharing, and can be purchased on the AWS Marketplace

Improvements.description: We operate and maintain the Vendia Share platform as a service so you don't have to
